job description:
This is a job where you will need to excel at explaining intricate technical information to the non-technical user. We're looking for driven individuals who are most productive in an active and positive environment. Robert Half Technology has a Desktop Support Technician role that may be the position for you, if you match these qualities. Motivated candidates with effective problem-solving abilities will be preferred for this position. This Desktop Support Analyst role is long term temporary in nature and is located in the Lakeland, Florida, area.

Your responsibilities in this role
  • Administer support on a variety of computer hardware and software issues by identifying, researching, and resolving technical problems
  • Create records of daily data communication transactions, issues and remedial actions taken or installation activities
  • Retain, investigate, and restore computer systems, hardware, printers, and computer peripherals
  • Interface regularly and effectively with ticket submitters
  • Offer computer desktop support in accordance with established policies and procedures
  • Settle computer problems, and offer suggestions on appropriate action/solutions
  • Match hardware repairs with the appropriate vendors
